get.description: This API lists a particular number of events, based on the limit specified.

post.description: This API adds an event entry to your help desk portal.

get.description: This API fetches the details of an event.

patch.description: This API updates the details of an event.

post.description: This API deletes the given spam events
This API updates multiple events at once.

get.description: This API lists a particular number of events associated with an account, based on the limit specified.

post.description: This API moves event entries to the Recycle Bin of your help desk portal.

get.description: This API lists a particular number of events associated with a ticket, based on the limit specified.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort by a specific attribute: @startTime@ or @createdTime@.The default sorting order is ascending. A @-@ prefix denotes descending order of sorting.

schema.description: Sort by a specific attribute: @startTime@ or @createdTime@.The default sorting order is ascending. A @-@ prefix denotes descending order of sorting.

get.description: This API lists a particular number of events associated with a contact, based on the limit specified.

post.description: This API deletes all spam events.

contactId.description: ID of the contact associated with the event

departmentId.description: ID of the department associated with the event and ticket

startTime.description: Time when the event started. The value of this key must be recorded in theÂ ISO date format of yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ss.SSSZ.

ownerId.description: ID of the user to whom the event is assigned

ticketId.description: ID of the ticket associated with the event

x-custom-parameters-attributes.descrption: Key that denotes whether to fetch spam activities or not

isSpam.description: Key that denotes whether to fetch spam events or not

x-custom-parameters-attributes.descrption: Time when details of the event entry were modified

modifiedTime.descrption: Time when details of the event entry were modified

relativeReminderInMin.descrption: The remainder for activity should be given as number of minutes

reminderType.descrption: Type of the reminder. Values allowed are @ABSOLUTE@ and @RELATIVE@

reminderTime.descrption: Time when the reminder must be triggered
